Pii Catcher for MySQL, PostgreSQL & Redshift
===============================

Overview
--------

A utility to find PII data in databases

Installation / Usage
--------------------

To install use pip:

    $ pip install piicatcher


Or clone the repo:

    $ git clone https://github.com/vrajat/piicatcher.git
    $ python setup.py install
